import axios from 'axios' import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' export default function AddUser() { let navigate = useNavigate(); //hook that redirects user after an event const [user, setUsers]=useState({ name:"", username:"", email:"" }) const {name, username, email}= user const onInputChange=(e)=>{ setUsers({...user, [e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } const onSubmit = async (e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); //prevents creating weird urls await axios.post("http://localthost:8080/user",user) navigate("/") //useNavigate redirects to homepage } return (
{/* column medium 6 offset medium size 3 */}
